Oakville ON

- YOUR TRUSTED ARCHITECTURE FIRM

Leading architects can count on

At , we are more than just an architecture firm—we are a team of visionary creators dedicated to crafting spaces that inspire. Based in , we proudly serve residential, commercial, and institutional clients across Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Milton, Toronto, Hamilton, St. Catharines, and Niagara.

Our passion lies in architectural design that merges innovation with sustainability. We take pride in our design-oriented approach. Every project here is a blend of aesthetic excellence and functional brilliance. With a diverse team that includes architects, architectural technologists, interior designers, and graphic designers, we bring together industry expertise.

Collaborating closely with top-tier consultants ranging from structural to civil engineers, we transform visions into reality - one exceptional design at a time.
Danforth

Glimpse at Our Architecture Firm Projects

Explore our diverse portfolio that spans across real estate developments, urban designs, and landscape architecture. We create beautiful spaces that fit well with their environment, including homes and unique landscape designs. Discover how our expertise transforms visions into reality, enhancing both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

High-Rises Residential
235 Plains Road Burlington
Commercial, Institutional and Industrial
2496 Bristol Circle, Oakville ON – Banquet Hall
Commercial, Institutional and Industrial Interior Design
New Dental Clinic in Oakville ON
High-Rises Interior Design Residential
West Harbour Condo, Hamilton, ON

Our Services

High-Rises

We have extensive expertise in designing high-rise buildings such as condominiums or office spaces from start to finish. This includes an in-depth knowledge of building codes, built environment, zoning regulations, and construction methods. We take your original vision and turn it into a beautiful high-rise condo, no matter the style. We develop innovative and cutting-edge designs that help your condo stand out in the market.

01
Mid-Rises

Unlike many other architecture companies, focuses on the design aspect, ensuring that you get the customized building you want. We specialize in fully residential, mixed-use developments, and commercial-only builds. No matter what facility you envision, we can take on the challenge. From the initial schematic design to the final details, we craft every project with precision and creativity.

02
Custom Homes

When you want your neighbourhood property to stand out from the crowd, hire in for custom-built homes. When your family’s lifestyle and needs call for building solutions beyond the norm, we design custom-built homes to our clients’ exact requirements and wishes. This way, they can relax and unwind on the property they’ve always dreamed about. 

03
Commercial Architecture

We offer services in a range of different sectors. Our architecture firm has a residential division as well as a non-residential division, allowing us to dedicate our expertise to your next commercial endeavour. Whether you need a medical facility, office building, warehouse, or retail building, the team at can help with any type of architectural design.

04
Commercial Architecture & Retail Buildings

has successfully completed several residential projects. While our design firm specializes in master planning and execution for modern design, we don’t shy away from a well-done traditional project. Able to work in whatever style you prefer, we’re sure to leave a beautiful mark on the neighbourhood.

05
Interior Design

Our licensed architects can help you modify, expand, or improve your existing home to make it work better for you. Whether it’s a new room, a larger kitchen, or a second story, we can update the overall layout of your home. Our architecture firm Ontario ensures all projects including residential and commercial buildings meet local building codes and regulations and are structurally sound & aesthetically pleasing.

06

News and featured projects

Stay updated with the latest happenings that include architectural innovation and design development. Check out our featured projects to see how our meticulous design process brings creative concepts to life. Explore how we push the boundaries of architectural excellence with each new endeavour.

Portfolio, Residential, Residential Contemporary - September 3, 2024
2 Upton Road in Scarborough ON by
Portfolio, Residential, Residential Traditional - March 22, 2022
Cherryhill Road Private Residence in Oakville by

12 Deanna Road Wasaga Beach Ontario by
Portfolio, Residential, Residential Contemporary - January 11, 2021
Modern House in Toronto by

Discover how our architecture and interior design services stand out from other architectural firms — contact us today to start your project and transform your space.

Don’t wait! Discuss your dream build now.

WHAT CLIENTS SAY

“Working with was amazing. is a great person to work with and he helped me design my dream house. He always listens and provides great feedback. I would highly recommend working with this business!”

Gurjit S.

What Clients Say

“Working with was amazing. is a great person to work with and he helped me design my dream house. He always listens and provides great feedback. I would highly recommend working with this business!”

Gurjit S.
Google my Business

“We chose based on a referral from a friend and builder. Our experience dealing directly with has been very rewarding as we enjoy the patience and professionalism that their team provides. We shared our big picture dream, and the team has made it a reality and now it is time to submit to the city for permits. Very exciting.”

GS
Google my Business

“Totally impressed!! I have had a pleasure working with from As a professional Architect, he listens carefully and understands your taste and needs and while his fee is fair, he's totally professional and responsive. He'll sure get the design of your dream home done, above and beyond your expectations. I cannot say enough good things about , but all in all, it was a pleasure working with him and I look forward to working with him in the future.”

R Daneshvar
Google my Business

“I have known for several years and have hired his services for 2 residential and one commercial jobs. He is very professional, has great ideas and is responsive to adjustments and innovative concepts. has always been fair with pricing and pays attention to the fine details required. His company is 5 stars in my books!”

Paul M.
Google my Business

“ patiently worked with us to explore the different possibilities on a variety of projects that included commercial properties and residential subdivisions. They carefully took the time to explain the process in its entirety and demonstrated a continued dedication towards maintaining a transparent and collaborative client-architect relationship. We are appreciative of the help, and we have a great deal of respect both for the work the firm does as well as for and the rest of the team.”

Ghazawan
Google my Business

“ is a brilliant architect who has a real eye for design! I have worked with him personally and found him and his firm to be most accommodating and wanting to go that extra mile. His insight is invaluable to anyone wanting to design their dream home.”

Dan C
Google my Business

“We have been working with for almost two years, they have designed a Banquet Hall for us, they are very professional and responsive to every question we have. We are almost getting our permit and we had a lot of help from them to achieve our goal. I would highly recommend them.”

Nada M
Google my Business

“ and his team designed a new home for our family in Mississauga/Mineola West area. managed the whole process (Site Plan Approval, Committee of Adjustments, Building Permits) and delivered every step of the way. We were satisfied with his services, and he did great work overall.”

Massimo N
Google my Business
